name: Radware Cloud DDoS Protection Services
description: Radware Cloud DDoS Protection Service offers multi-layered defense using advanced behavioral algorithms to detect and mitigate Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) attacks, from infrastructure-level floods to application-layer assaults. The service leverages a global network of scrubbing centers and supports flexible deployment options, including always-on, on-demand, and hybrid models, backed by an industry-leading mitigation SLA.
author: Cortex XSOAR
